meanings.definition: Relating to the detailed structure of cells or tissues at a very small scale.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a powerful microscope to examine the ultrastructural features of the cell.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the ultrastructural components of the tissue sample.
meanings.sent3: The ultrastructural details of the cell were so tiny that they seemed like a hidden world.
meanings.sent4: The ultrastructural intricacies of the tissue revealed a complex network of connections.
meanings.sent5: The ultrastructural characteristics of the cell were like a miniature puzzle waiting to be solved.

meanings.definition: Involving the study or analysis of minute details within a biological specimen.
meanings.sent1: Researchers focused on the ultrastructural examination of the specimen to uncover hidden information.
meanings.sent2: The biologist's work involved the ultrastructural investigation of the biological sample.
meanings.sent3: The ultrastructural analysis of the specimen revealed unexpected patterns.
meanings.sent4: The ultrastructural study of the biological specimen was like deciphering a microscopic code.
meanings.sent5: The ultrastructural scrutiny of the sample unveiled a world of intricate details.
